creator: gael.lalire@laposte.net
text: StatusManagerServlet.destroy should call mBeanServer.removeNotificationListener because init method call mBeanServer.addNotificationListener.

creator: violetagg@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the report.
Fixed in trunk and 7.0.x and will be included in 8.0.0-RC4 and 7.0.46 onwards.

Regards
Violeta
